bioconda.name: bioconductor-genomicfiles
bioconda.summary: Distributed computing by file or by range

biotools.summary: This package provides infrastructure for parallel computations distributed 'by file' or 'by range'. User defined MAPPER and REDUCER functions provide added flexibility for data combination and manipulation.

bioschemas.name: GenomicFiles
bioschemas.summary: This package provides infrastructure for parallel computations distributed 'by file' or 'by range'. User defined MAPPER and REDUCER functions provide added flexibility for data combination and manipulation.
